sense.def: Alternative Names jing shui bu zhi 經水不 止 ; yue jing bu zhi 月經不止 ; jing xue bu zhi 經血不止 ; jing mai bu zhi 經脈不止 ; jing bu zhi 經不止 ; yue shui bu duan 月水不斷 ; yue jing bu duan 月經不斷 ; jing shui bu duan 經水不斷. Pathological Condition of a jing bing 經病 , menstrual disease, with a duration of bleeding exceding seven days. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 73 : 治婦人崩中下五色及下血，或月水不止，側柏 散方 , “To cure women experiencing a collapsing center with discharge in various colors as well as discharge of blood, and also incessant menstruation , the recipe for the powder with ce bai [is appropriate]”.
